name: SQLiteUnbuffered.current
purpose: Fetches the current row from a result set as an array

return.description:
Returns an array of the current row from a result set; FALSE if the
   current position is beyond the final row.The column names returned by
SQLITE_ASSOC and SQLITE_BOTH will be
case-folded according to the value of the
sqlite.assoc_case configuration
option.
